programme.title: The Stand in the Schoolhouse Door of 1963
programme.short_synopsis: The 25th anniversary of the desegregation of the University of Alabama.
programme.medium_synopsis: Cooke recalls the moment when the segregationist George Wallace, Governor of Alabama, attempted to prevent a black student enrolling at the University of Alabama in 1963.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: The Stand in the Schoolhouse Door of 1963

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
